name: beijing-charity
description: 支持工作居住证系统在chrome中运行
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://f100.bytedance.net; script-src http://localhost:3000 https://f100.bytedance.net 'unsafe-eval' 'self'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://f100.bytedance.net; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
